issue.title: [Doc][Python] Improve compute documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13832](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13832). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The documentation page is mostly empty ( https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/compute.html ) but the API reference instead is fairly complete ( https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/api/compute.html ) it would be a good idea to add a bit more context and maybe directly recap the compute functions into to doc page

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13832?focusedCommentId=17428490) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~amol-]` shall we fix this issue for 6.0 or can we postpone it to 7.0?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13832?focusedCommentId=17456416) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11830
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11830>
